channel.title: CVE Feed for Lenovo -- System Management Module (SMM)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Lenovo -- System Management Module (SMM)

item.title: CVE-2023-2992|2024-08-02T06:41:04.131Z -- lenovo -- system%20management%20module%20%28smm%29
item.description: An unauthenticated Â denial of service vulnerability exists in the SMM v1, SMM v2, and FPC management web server which can be triggered under crafted conditions. Rebooting SMM or FPC will restore access to the management web server.

item.title: CVE-2023-2993|2024-08-02T06:41:04.129Z -- lenovo -- system%20management%20module%20%28smm%29
item.description: A valid, authenticated user with limited privileges may be able to use specifically crafted web management server API calls to execute a limited number of commands on SMM v1, SMM v2, and FPC that the user does not normally have sufficient privileges to execute.
